title: Hand in Hand
description: Two guardsmen escort the repeat offender Faber to an island prison to sit out a three year sentence. He immediately begins manipulated the gullible Ten Bruggencate and manages to aggravate the other, Miechels.

title: Ieder voor zich
description: The three new arrivals, Faber, Peer & Rosenboom get their physical before settling into prison. Being the most experienced, Faber aims to get a cushy job for himself and also gives first timer Rozenboom some tips.

title: Quitte of Dubbel
description: Faber is taking care of the prison's pigs and chickens and betting on everything against Snoek. Rosenboom is adamant never to place a bet, so naturally Faber tries to make him break his promise.

title: Hard tegen hard
description: Faber is the only one who can talk to fellow inmate Sunny, who has a very short fuse and constantly feels he is being mistreated. When Sunny climbs a roof and threatens to jump off, Faber offers to go up after him and talk him down.

title: Een avondje thuis
description: Rosenboom temporarily has to share Faber's cell. The younger man misses his fiancé Desiré and Faber decides to help the boy, despite not wanting to share.

title: Een dagje uit
description: The boys have to do labor outside the prison. As soon as Miechels takes leave to visit the local pub, Faber and friends take advantage of Ten Bruggencate's easy going nature.

title: Mannen zonder vrouwen
description: Faber helps the other inmates write a letter to their loved ones. Of course on visitors day the ladies soon find out they all received the same letter. But then Faber's daughter Ingrid tells him his wife wants to start over without him.

title: Blikken en blozen
description: Faber throws a fit after a tin of pineapples has been stolen from his cell. Of course he didn't exactly acquire it in by honest means himself, and Ten Bruggencate knows it.

title: Laat maar Zitten Extra!! - Bloopers
description: A compilation of bloopers and out-takes from the first series of "Laat maar Zitten". Mostly made up of the actors bursting into laughter.

title: Voer voor kriminologen
description: The inmates are over the moon when they find out Miechels has been promoted and is leaving the penitentiary. Unfortunately he is replaced by the even more strict warden Spoelstra, an old acquaintance of Faber's.

title: De Klop op de deur
description: All Faber wants is some quiet time alone in his cell, but unfortunately for him everybody from Tol to Tenbrugecatte keeps bothering him and he doesn't get a moment rest.

title: Lokaas voor Snoek
description: Faber is in the hospital ward with a broken leg with old Taco and Snoek. In the middle of the night, old Taco tells Faber to take care of the map of buried loot he has been safeguarding.

title: Kamer zonder uitzicht
description: Wiebe has received a Dear John letter from Desirée, informing him she has married a marine. Faber is worried about his oldest daughter, Ingrid. During visiting hour, Wiebe immediately takes a liking to Ingrid and vice versa.

title: Vallen en neergaan
description: Jack the Noorman tells Faber to make sure Wiebe goes down in the second round of an important boxing match. But Wiebe has already promised to go down in the first to Jack's rival, Willem de Mol.

title: Omzien in wraak
description: Snoek returns to the penitentiary. New arrival Van Raamsdonk turns out to be both an old acquaintance of Mathilde the director as well as the Judge who put Faber away for 5 years.

title: Pillen en knoeiers
description: Snoek finds himself on Jack de Noorman's bad side after stealing medicine from the doctor's office.

title: Tunnel naar het licht
description: Faber has to go to a hospital in Delftzijl on account of his bad knee. De Noorman instructs him to pick up a package there to help the dimwitted convict 'De Beer' escape, because he owes a favor to De Beer Sr.

title: Klap op de vuurpijl
description: Ten Bruggencate and Miss Hoenkamp are being held hostage by Erwin Uckles and his self made revolver. Faber and Rosenboom, who are under suspicion of brewing illegal alcohol for New Years Eve, also get drawn into the situation.

title: Terug naar af
description: Old Taco is to be released after 17 years. But he refuses to go to prove his innocence. Faber leads the other prisoners to strike for Taco's cause.

title: Eigen schuld en boete
description: While Faber is holed up in the hospital ward, new arrival and notorious snitch Edje Janssen is about to be taught a lesson during the monthly feature film presentation. Uckels, to whom Edje still owes a substantial sum of money, is torn whether to warn the snitch or not.

title: Kennis of kracht
description: Wiebe finds it difficult to study for his history exam with Faber in the same cell. So Faber decides to help and gets some of the other guys together to steal the acquire the answers beforehand.

title: Miechels versus Miechels
description: Warden Miechels is especially harsh to Job, a young inmate who is in prison for refusing the military draft. When the boy turns out to be the warden's son, Faber decides to increase the Job's self image by having him enter the much anticipated arm wrestling competition.

title: Zo Faber, zo dochter
description: Faber is making a vase out of clay for his daughter Ingrid's birthday. Ten Bruggencate suggests to give her his pet bird Kootje. But then the bird gets loose in prison.

title: B-Vleugel Blues
description: The prisoners are awoken in the middle of the night so the wardens can search for drugs that have been smuggled into prison. As Faber and the boys compare notes, they begin suspecting warden Ten Bruggencate of being the supplier.

title: Eind van de zit
description: Rosenboom is about to be released early on account of good behavior, but may yet ruin his chances by getting into a fight with big brawny Joeks.

title: Bloopers
description: Another compilation of bloopers, this time from the second series of Laat Maar Zitten.

title: Man of Superman
description: Peer Tol's wife has lost her job and now he wants to escape and help her. Snoek has gotten hold of a bottle of Whiskey meant for Jack de Noorman's birthday.

title: Dieren zonder manieren
description: Peer has found a puppy dog and named him Skippy. Faber insists he gets rid of the dog but not without finding someone to look after it first.

title: Soort zoekt soort
description: Uckels gets a new roommate, Alex Hoorn, but he gets upset when rumors start circulating that both of them are gay.

title: Vraag en antwoord
description: Faber is chosen to be the subject of an interview by a young female reporter, but only because of extensive lies on his application.

title: Pech van de sterkste
description: Faber is called in to help the director open her safe when she misplaces an important speech and plane tickets in it.

title: Vergeten te vergeven
description: Faber refuses to attend Barry van der Wallen's funeral, because the man betrayed him and stole his girlfriend 30 years earlier. Then Barry's daughter Sheila visits prison to persuade him to come.

title: Vader van de rekening
description: Miechels has organized a record breaking attempt for all the prisoners. Ten Bruggencate offers to help Joeks keep custody of his daughter.

title: De zak van Cynthia
description: Ten Bruggencate can't find anyone to portray Sint Nicholaas during the annual Sinterklaas festivities. Meanwhile he comes up with an idea to smuggle Uckels' girlfriend Cynthia into prison.

title: Jeugd en ondeugd
description: Jack de Noorman takes a young new inmate called Oscar under his wing. But Oscar soon proves to be a bit too smart and violent even for the Noorman and his crew.

title: Faber ende Wiebergast
description: Faber is playing the lead in a production of 'Karel ende Elegast', only to be surprised by the return to prison of Wiebe Rosenboom.

title: Snel van de weg weg
description: A selection of prisoners is going on a bus trip to a protest rally. Alex manages to escape with help from his mother and sister (disguised as nuns). Faber and Uckles, chained together, also get involved in the great escape.

title: Laster en listen
description: A posh new inmate starts a gambling ring. All the prisoners are very excited, except for Faber, who smells a rat.

title: Kind noch kraai
description: On the day Faber is granted an early parole, he learns his wife has left him and taken all of his money. Uckels gets into a scrape with a fellow inmate and Faber gets the blame.

title: Kroon op het werk
description: Norbert Voorbraak arrives at the prison in the middle of the night, claiming to be the local major and to have Queen Beatrix & Prince Claus with him.

title: De afvaller wint
description: Snoek has a new escape plan to coincide with the prison snooker tournament. But he will first have to lose some weight if he wants to fit through a bathroom window.

title: Wissel van de macht
description: As soon as the new director, Sophia Schollevaar, arrives she begins criticizing Miechels and Ten Bruggencate on their way of conduct. Meanwhile Uckels and Bruce get on each others nerves and refuse to share a cell any longer.

title: Terreur en maneschijn
description: Miechels & Ten Bruggencate are on edge because dangerous Irish terrorist Ken McInneconneckie is staying at the prison. To make matters worse, there is a blackout all over the island.

title: Klik in de kabel
description: Director Schollevaar is interested in discovering where a new in-mate has stashed the loot from a jewelry heist, so she can claim a finders fee.

title: Recht in eigen hand
description: After Krukas steals a letter from Uckels girlfriend, Uckels seeks revenge.

title: Buigen en barsten
description: When most of B-wing ends up with a hernia, after digging in the mud for warden Miechels, director Schollevaar takes it upon herself to teach a light aerobic class.

title: Onmens en gevoelens
description: Johan is depressed and suicidal. His 17 year old daughter comes to visit and wants to sue Ten Bruggencate.

title: Kunst met peren
description: New inmate Ernst Rochel claims to possess an actual study by Rembrandt and asks Bruce to paint a layer over it to disguise it. Director Schollevaar finds herself attracted to the charismatic former art dealer.

title: Braden in het zweet
description: The prison is suffering from a heatwave. When Miechel's precious ping-pong balls are stolen, he orders every prisoner out in the yard until they've been found.

title: Moeizaam aan de top
description: Sophia Schollevaar has been director for three months and thinks she is already universally hated. However, the warders are organizing a belated welcoming party.

title: Tussen kus en kitsch
description: Rochel and director Schollevaar have a secret meeting so he can evaluate some stored artwork. But they end up stuck together while warden Miechels searches the entire island.

title: Hongerloon naar werk
description: Schollevaar has invented a new points system to evaluate the prison staff. This leads to great competitiveness between Miechels & Ten Bruggencate. Meanwhile Uckels is afraid his girlfriend has been unfaithful while on holiday.

title: Bloot en spelen
description: Miechels is not pleased with Schollevaar's new visiting room, where prisoners can have intercourse with guests. Rochel manages to book Peer's young niece and her singing group for Ten Bruggencate's music appreciation group.

title: Stoppen of doorslaan
description: Miechels and Ten Bruggecate have a falling out on account of the annual children's play. The B-wing gets a temporary addition in the form of a hardened criminal from the States.

title: Inpakken en doorpezen
description: When Director Schollevaar puts everyone on Ping-pong packing duty, Simon K.J. Ten Bruggencate decides to stick up for them as well as himself.

title: Wijn en dijn
description: When Rochel complaints about Johan's cookery the director decides to give him one last chance at a grand diner with a glass of wine. But Rochel manages to get his hands on the case of wine first.

title: Grappen en rollen
description: The moment Rochel is reunited with his old pal Mario de Mol several of the prisoner's possessions begin to disappear. But it is Uckels who gets blamed.

title: Duel zonder diepte
description: When Hoebe is replaced by his young intern, Maarten Bijl, Rochel sees him as a rival for the director's affections and becomes jealous. She decides the two of them should duel it out, and Maarten chooses to play a game of checkers.

title: Kok in het nauw
description: The prisoners all boycott Johan the cook when they suspect him of having an incestuous relationship with his daughter.

title: Lust en bedrog
description: When the director hires a new, female guard, Miechels thinks he is falling in love. But Ten Bruggecate makes a startling discovery.

title: Broers voor het leven
description: Krukas refuses to meet with his handicapped but more successful brother Charles. The Director plans to publish a booklet of letters written by the prisoners.

title: Rechten en oplichten
description: When new prisoner Bas-Jan refusal to eat doesn't work, he pretends to have been molested by Miechels, who is suspended until proven innocent.

title: Kijk- en luisterheld
description: The prison has been equipped with surveillance cameras. This means warden Holst has become redundant. When the other guards decide to stick up for him and strike, only Schollevaar & Hoenstra are left to take care of the prisoners.
